comments.body: *** Bug 39048 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

My apologies about that.  It should be fixed for 5.5.17 which is due to be
tagged this Friday, April 14th.
*** Bug 39344 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

BTW, I suggest "OS" should be changed to "Windows" (XP or 2000, which you like).
.exe is Win32 only and used nowhere else.

description:
All of the un-jar'd .class files in the 5.5.16 .exe distribution have a 0x0A
(line feed) appended to them, causing errors during class loading.  (The .zip
distribution is not affected.)  Suspect someone at some point did an ASCII-mode
FTP with an overly helpful client.  All impacted .class files are in the
jsp-examples and servlets-examples WEB-INF/classes directories.
